name: Telgesinus

attributes.attribute: instructed the magician Merlin in the secret ways of the universe

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: Welsh legend speaks of Telgesinus, a great Bard known as Taliesin, who imparted knowledge of the secrets of the universe to the magician Merlin, as stated in a Welsh text.
